name: Booty Bay
description: This booming coastal city is run by Baron Revilgaz of the Blackwater Raiders.  Mortal enemies of the Bloodsail Buccaneers and part of the Steamwheedle Cartel.

name: Ironforge
description: This Alliance capital is the pride of the Dun Morogh dwarves.  Home to King Magni.

name: Gnomeregan Exiles
description: The former denizens of Gnomeregan, now living in exile in Ironforge and in league with the Alliance.

name: Thorium Brotherhood
description: The dwarves of the Thorium Brotherhood epitomize excellence in craftsmanship and are bent on unlocking the secrets of Blackrock Mountain.

name: Undercity
description: Led by Sylvanas Windrunner, the Forsaken have joined a tenuous alliance with the Horde and established this capital in the vast depths under the Ruins of Lordaeron.

name: Darnassus
description: The Alliance capital is populated by Night Elves and is located in the island of Teldrassil.  Ruled by the Priestess of the Moon, Tyrande Whisperwind.

name: Syndicate
description: A primarily human criminal organization that operates mostly out of the Alterac Mountains and Hillsbrad Foothills.

name: Stormwind
description: One of the last bastions of human power, this Alliance capital is ruled by the child king, Anduin Wrynn.

name: Orgrimmar
description: Founded by Thrall, this Horde capital city is home to many of the proud orc clans of Durotar.

name: Thunder Bluff
description: Cairne Bloodhoof leads his people, the Proud Tauren, from this mighty Horde capital.

name: Bloodsail Buccaneers
description: These bloodthirsty corsairs are the bane of many a merchant in the high seas.  Sworn enemies of Booty Bay.

name: Gelkis Clan Centaur
description: These centaur have made their home in the southern region of Desolace.  Mortal enemies of the Magram Centaur.

name: Magram Clan Centaur
description: These centaur have made their home in the eastern region of Desolace.  Mortal enemies of the Gelkis Centaur.

name: Zandalar Tribe
description: These trolls have come to Yojamba Isle in an effort to recruit help against the resurrected Blood God and his Atal'ai Priests in Zul'Gurub.

name: Ravenholdt
description: This guild of thieves and assassins welcomes only those of extraordinary prowess into its fold.  Sworn rivals of the Syndicate.

name: Gadgetzan
description: Capital of the Steamwheedle Cartel and home to goblinhood's finest engineers, alchemists and merchants.

name: Ratchet
description: Part of the Steamwheedle Cartel, this goblin city provides a neutral haven for those that wish to trade goods and services in the Barrens.

name: Wildhammer Clan
description: Though not a part of the Alliance, the dwarves of Aerie Peak have opened their doors to it and hold the Horde as enemies.

name: The League of Arathor
description: The League of Arathor seeks to reclaim lost land of Arathi Basin for their benefactors in Stormwind.

name: The Defilers
description: The Defilers seek to claim Arathi Basin's valuable resources for the Horde.

name: Argent Dawn
description: An organization focused on protecting Azeroth from the threat of the Scourge.  Strongholds of the Argent Dawn can be found in the Eastern and Western Plaguelands.

name: Darkspear Trolls
description: This tribe of exiled trolls has joined forces with Thrall and the Horde.  They now call Durotar their home, which they share with their orc allies.

name: Timbermaw Hold
description: As the last uncorrupted furbolg tribe, the Timbermaw seek to preserve their spiritual ways and end the suffering of their brethren.

name: Everlook
description: This trading post is run by the goblins of the Steamwheedle Cartel and it sits in the crossroads of Winterspring's main trade routes.

name: Wintersaber Trainers
description: This small group of reclusive night elves raises and trains wintersabers in the Winterspring area.

name: Cenarion Circle
description: The druids of Cenarion Circle are guardians of nature and make their home in tranquil Moonglade.

name: Frostwolf Clan
description: The Frostwolf Clan seeks to drive out the dwarves of the Stormpike Expedition from Alterac Valley.

name: Stormpike Guard
description: The Stormpike Dwarves have set up residence in Alterac Valley, where they're locked in battle with the Frostwolf Orcs.

name: Hydraxian Waterlords
description: These elementals have made their home on the islands east of Azshara.  Sworn enemies of the armies of Ragnaros.

name: Shen'dralar
description: A remnant of the once powerful elves living in Dire Maul, yet still wise and knowledgeable about great secrets.

name: Warsong Outriders
description: Fierce orcs of the Warsong Clan, locked in battle against the Silverwing Sentinels in Warsong Gulch.

name: Silverwing Sentinels
description: Staunch defenders of Ashenvale, locked in battle against the Warsong Outriders in Warsong Gulch.

name: Darkmoon Faire
description: A traveling fair that showcases the weird and the extraordinary.  Often spotted in Elwynn Forest and Mulgore.

name: Brood of Nozdormu
description: The descendants of the Bronze Dragonflight are the guardians of time and care little for the mortal races.

name: Test Faction (not a real faction)
description: This faction only exists to test the editing of faction names and descriptions...
